fields.description:
h6. Issue
In Ti.Media when toggling subtitle icon media player jumps to full screen.

h6. expected result
Should toggle on subtitles but remain compact. 

h6. actual result
Jumps into full screen mode

h6. Steps to replicate
1. download app
2. run on iOS
3. Toggle subtittles on/off

h6. Link to download app
https://propelics.box.com/s/o40cxj9dz99qkdnlioqsz1sk4dxmke8p
fields.summary: Titanium.Media jumps into full screen when toggling Subtitles

comments.body:
Please let me know if you need anymore information from me
Best, 
Victor Montero
